events.message: I would like to request a refund for my recent order because the product did not meet my expectations and I am dissatisfied with its quality.
The customer issue has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the refund request and dissatisfaction expressed regarding the product.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily J., who specializes in refund processing and customer satisfaction resolutions.
Hello, this is Emily from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund, and I'm here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide the order number and details on the issue with the product so we can proceed with your refund request?
The order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged and the quality does not match the description, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label within the next 24 hours.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. Please send the return label as soon as possible so I can send the product back.
Your refund request has been processed, and the return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please send the item back within 7 days.
Just following up to confirm that you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Since the return has been completed and your refund processed, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
